Name: Solaris
Ingredients: 45 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
15 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. *Special ingredient #1 : Sorrel water made by blending 100g sorrel with 70ml water, fine strain.
History: Created for Bacardí Legacy 2017 by Max Ivaschenko at Motel, Moscow, Russia. Inspiration : “Solaris is a drink that is dedicated to modern times and disappearing values: tradition, family, faith in the future.”
Nutrition: One serving of Solaris contains 143 calories
